name: Wolfenstein 3D Full Version Game Data
summary: Learn about .WL6 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The six-episode version of Wolfenstein 3D contains nine default WL6 files:
In the original, shareware version of Wolfenstein 3D, these files were saved with the .WL1 extension. In the three-episode version, these files were saved with the .WL3 extension.

description: A WL6 file is a game data file used by the full, six-episode version of iD Software's Wolfenstein 3D. It contains a portion of the game's data, such as its maps, audio files, or graphics files. Various Wolfenstein 3D modding utilities can extract or edit the data WL6 files contain.

instructions: You can open WL3 files and edit or extract the game data they contain using Wolfenstein 3D modding utilities, such as SLADE (multiplatform) or Havoc's Wolf3D Editor (Windows).
